scripts.ios: amplify env checkout dev && react-native run-ios --simulator 'iPhone 15 Pro' --scheme 'BayQi-Dev'
scripts.ios:stag: amplify env checkout stag && react-native run-ios --simulator 'iPhone 15 Pro' --scheme 'BayQi-Staging'
scripts.android:stag-release: cp .env.staging .env  &&  cd android && gradlew assembleStagingRelease && cd ..
scripts.android:dev-release: cp .env.dev .env &&  cd android && gradlew assembleDevRelease && cd ..
scripts.android:prod-release: cp .env.prod .env  &&  cd android && gradlew assembleProdRelease && cd ..
